name: Coconutmilk Pumpkin Macchiato
instruction:
● Coconutmilk Mocha Macchiato
●  Made with Pumpkin Spice Syrup instead of white mocha syrup
●  Top with Pumpkin Spice topping

name: Honey Nut Macchiato
instruction:
● Caramel Macchiato
●  Sub vanilla syrup for Chestnut Praline Syrup
●  Top with a packet or two of honey depending on size

name: Caramel Snickerdoodle Macchiato
instruction:
● Iced Soy Caramel Macchiato, upside down
●  Add Vanilla Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti)
●  Add Cinnamon Dolce Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti)

name: Raspberry Caramel Macchiato
instruction:
● A Raspberry Caramel Macchiato is made the same way as a regular Caramel Macchiato, but subs raspberry syrup for the vanilla syrup found on the bottom of the drink.
●  That one substitute gives the drink a completely different flavour, but makes it easy to order as well.
●  So from bottom to top it goes, raspberry syrup, ice, milk, espresso, then caramel on top!

name: Turtle Macchiato
instruction:
● Mocha syrup (2 pumps tall, 3 grande, 4 venti)
●  Caramel syrup (2 pumps tall, 3 grande, 4 venti)
●  Add choice of milk
●  Add espresso shots
●  Criss-cross over the foam or whip with mocha and caramel syrup

name: Caramel Pumpkin Macchiato
instruction:
● Caramel Macchiato
●  Made with Pumpkin Spice Syrup instead of vanilla
●  Top with pumpkin spice topping

name: Chocolate Macchiato
instruction:
● Mocha syrup (2 pumps tall, 3 pumps grande, 4 pumps venti)
●  White Mocha syrup (2 pumps tall, 3 pumps grande, 4 pumps venti)
●  Add milk
●  Add espresso shots
●  Criss-cross over the foam or whip with mocha and white mocha syrup

name: The Roasted Chestnut
instruction:
● Hazelnut Macchiato
●  Add toffee nut syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti)
●  Add extra hazelnut syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti)
●  Add white chocolate mocha Syrup (1/2 pump tall and grande, 1 pump venti)
●  Top with spiced whipped cream and hazelnut drizzle

name: Caramel Macchiato Frappuccino
instruction:
● Vanilla Bean Frappuccino
●  Add 2 pumps of Frappuccino Roast
●  Top with caramel drizzle and whipped cream
